reviewText: I came on time. Very good movie.

Disappointed....The voices sounded childish to the point it got on my last nerve. . I can't not even watch the movie because of this. I seen the movie on Netflix ...this made me want to buy the movie..I am sorry that I ever did.

I first started watching this drama on NETFLIX and I loved all 18 episodes.  I loved this drama so much that I decided that I must have it for my collection.  However, this DVD of it is sadly lacking.  First off, when I placed it in my DVD player, the audio was in Chinese instead of Korean.  The Chinese audio was to funny for words and irritating.  Second, you have to constantly change the audio and subtitle after every episodes.  That's also irritating.  Third, some of the scenes were deleted or the audio was removed.  Even though I haven't watched every episodes from this DVD, I do know that on the first episode the audio was removed from the scene where she is thinking back on all of the other interviews that she had gone through.  You can follow what she is saying if you have the subtitle on.  On episode 16, Noh Eunsoel video recorded herself singing a message to Jiheon which was deleted from this DVD.  If you haven't watched this on NETFLIX, then you won't be missing anything, since you wouldn't know that there are some scene that were either altered or deleted.  But since I've seen this at least 15 times on NETFLIX, then I've very disappointed in this disc.  I give the drama five stars and the DVDs three stars.

I highly recommend this drama. You'll laugh, cry and go "AHHH"
This was a great series I have already watched it twice in the last month! Heartfelt, funny and just amazing the perfect korean drama!
